author: newsr.in
title: Streaming Services Amazon, Netflix And HBO Win Big At Emmys - newsR
text: Streaming services are continuing their march into Hollywood, competing head-on with network television not only for viewership numbers, but now also for critical acclaim and industry recognition. At last night’s Primetime Emmy awards , services including Amazon, Netflix and – if you count it – HBO, which this year launched its own over-the-top option for cord cutters with… Read More »
